flavor_text_entries.black:
This legendary Pokémon battled against
humans to protect Pokémon.
Its personality is calm and composed.
flavor_text_entries.white:
It has a body and heart of steel.
Its glare is sufficient to make even
an unruly Pokémon obey it.
flavor_text_entries.black-2:
It has a body and heart of steel.
It worked with its allies to punish
people when they hurt Pokémon.
flavor_text_entries.white-2:
It has a body and heart of steel.
It worked with its allies to punish
people when they hurt Pokémon.
flavor_text_entries.x:
It has a body and heart of steel. Its glare is
sufficient to make even an unruly Pokémon obey it.
flavor_text_entries.y:
It has a body and heart of steel. It worked with its
allies to punish people when they hurt Pokémon.
flavor_text_entries.omega-ruby:
It has a body and heart of steel. Its glare is
sufficient to make even an unruly Pokémon obey it.
flavor_text_entries.alpha-sapphire:
It has a body and heart of steel. It worked with its
allies to punish people when they hurt Pokémon.
flavor_text_entries.sword:
This Pokémon appears in a legend alongside
Terrakion and Virizion, fighting against humans in
defense of the Unova region’s Pokémon.
flavor_text_entries.shield:
From the moment it’s born, this Pokémon
radiates the air of a leader. Its presence will
calm even vicious foes.
